entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:25 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -36.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 09:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -36.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -41.0°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
